content.rendered:
Reduce inflammation and irritation with this oxygenating mineral-rich leave on gel treatment. Soothes and calms skin after shaving to even skin tone and brighten complexion.

A blend of frankincense and cedarwood reduce irritation, refine pores and promote skin cell renewal, while carrot seed heals and repairs the skin to reduce pigmentation.

Designed to hydrate, firm and tone your skin, Skin Restore is a must-have addition to your shaving routine.

excerpt.rendered: A powerful firming gel treatment to sooth and calm after shaving.
